DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study is to establish normal optical values of breast tissue in the general population. This will allow for establishing normals for breast composition, and is expected to be useful in the classification of breast lesions into groups such as cysts, benign growths, inflammatory lesions, and possibly early breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Survey of Optical Values of the Breast Using Radiation-Free Pressure-Free Optical Scanning
DOC.criteria: You must be female You must be 21 to 50 years old You must not have or have had breast cancer. You must not have or have had breast implants or breast surgery You must not have had a breast biopsy or injury, or a breast infection, in 90 days. Any one or more of the above conditions not met Lack of informed consent
DOC.keyword: Women without a diagnosis for a region of interest in the breast
